Package plugins.file

Manages research, adding and removing plugins.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PluginChangedListener
    The PluginChangedListener interface contains the signatures of the methods that must be implemented by the PluginChangedListener's classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PluginChangedEvent
    A PluginChangedEvent is fire to listeners when a plugin is added or removed.
    PluginChangedLogger
    A PluginChangedLogger is using to add or remove a plugin from a plugin event.
    PluginEventListener
    Executes the method actionPerformed when one click on the corresponding item in the tools menu.
    PluginFilter
    A PluginFilter is a filter that accepts only files that corresponds to a plugin.
    PluginFinder
    A PluginFinder is in charge to search regularly for new plugins.

Package plugins.file Description

Manages research, adding and removing plugins.
